fields.title: Chief Executive Officer (CEO)
fields.description: Overall strategic vision and leadership of the company.

fields.title: Chief Technology Officer (CTO)
fields.description: Oversight of technological strategy and product innovation.

fields.title: Chief Operating Officer (COO)
fields.description: Manages day-to-day operations and oversees business performance.

fields.title: Chief Financial Officer (CFO)
fields.description: Leads financial planning, risk management, and budgeting.

fields.title: Vice President of Engineering
fields.description: Leads engineering teams and sets technical direction for product development.

fields.title: Vice President of Product
fields.description: Guides product strategy, market research, and product roadmaps.

fields.title: Director of Engineering
fields.description: Oversees multiple engineering teams and implements best practices.

fields.title: Product Manager
fields.description: Coordinates between teams to define and execute product roadmaps.

fields.title: Software Engineer
fields.description: Designs, develops, and maintains software applications.

fields.title: DevOps Engineer
fields.description: Builds and maintains deployment pipelines and operational infrastructure.

fields.title: UX/UI Designer
fields.description: Designs user interfaces and ensures optimal user experiences.

fields.title: Data Scientist
fields.description: Analyzes data to derive insights and drive decision-making.
